00137 // void loadData(char*) method
00138 
00139 void PressureEspectrumEstimationProblem::loadData(char* filename)
00140 {
00141    std::fstream file;
00142 
00143    file.open(filename, std::ios::in);
00144         
00145    if(!file.is_open())
00146    {
00147       std::cout << std::endl
00148                 << "Error: PressureEspectrumEstimationProblem class. void loadData(char*) method."
00149                                 << std::endl << "Cannot open data file." << std::endl
00150                 << std::endl;
00151                 
00152       exit(1);
00153    }
00154 
00155    // Load new number of samples
00156 
00157    file >> numberOfSamples;
00158 
00159    // Set new data matrix
00160 
00161    Matrix<double> newData(numberOfSamples, 2);
00162 
00163    data = newData;
00164 
00165    // Load data 
00166 
00167    for (int i = 0; i < numberOfSamples; i++) 
00168    {
00169       for (int j = 0; j < 2; j++)
00170       {
00171          file >> data[i][j];
00172       }         
00173    }
00174 
00175    file.close();
00176 }

00196 // Vector<double> getGradient(Vector<double>) method
00197 
00198 Vector<double> PressureEspectrumEstimationProblem
00199 ::getGradient(Vector<double> input)
00200 {
00201    Vector<double> gradient(numberOfVariables, 0.0);
00202 
00203    double output1 = 0.0, output2 = 0.0;
00204 
00205    for (int i = 0; i < numberOfVariables; i++)
00206    {
00207       // Add epsilon to input
00208 
00209       input[i] += epsilon;
00210 
00211       // Get output
00212 
00213       output2 = getOutput(input);
00214 
00215       // Restart original input
00216 
00217       input[i] -= epsilon;
00218 
00219       // Substract epsilon from input
00220 
00221       input[i] -= epsilon;
00222 
00223       // Get output
00224 
00225       output1 = getOutput(input);
00226 
00227       // Restart original input
00228 
00229       input[i] += epsilon;
00230 
00231       // Calculate derivative
00232 
00233       gradient[i] = (output2 - output1)/(2.0*epsilon);
00234    }
00235 
00236    return(gradient);
00237 }

00257       exit(1);
